# HumanBodyPose3DObservation

**Structure**

An observation that provides the 3D body points the request recognizes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HumanBodyPose3DObservation
```

## Creating an observation

- **init(_:)**: Creates a 3D human body pose observation.

## Inspecting an observation

- **RequestDescriptor**: A type that describes the request and revision combination.
- **bodyHeight**: The estimated human body height, in meters.
- **cameraOriginMatrix**: A transform from the skeleton hip to the camera.
- **HumanBodyPose3DObservation.EstimationTechnique**: Constants that identify body height estimation techniques.
- **heightEstimationTechnique**: The technique the framework uses to estimate body height.

## Getting the joints

- **allJoints(in:)**: Retrieves a dictionary of all joints in a joint group.
- **availableJointsGroupNames**: The names of the available joint groupings in the observation.
- **HumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointsGroupName**: The supported joint group names for the body pose.
- **joint(for:)**: Retrieves a joint for a given joint name.
- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.
- **HumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointName**: The supported joint names for the body pose.

## Getting the joint name

- **parentJointName(for:)**: Returns the parent joint of the joint name you specify.

## Getting the camera position

- **cameraRelativePosition(for:)**: Returns a position relative to the camera for the body joint you specify.

## Getting the joint position

- **pointInImage(for:)**: Returns a 2D point for the joint name you specify, relative to the input image.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VisionObservation
